data.title: City hall, mayor, stats, schools, attractions, and more
data.meta_description: Located in Minnesota, the City of Dodge Center has a lot to discover. Find more about its City Hall, Mayor, Schools, Banks, Passport Facilities, and Leisure Activities.
data.text:
The City of Dodge Center is located in the state of Minnesota, in Dodge County. Its area, population and other key information are listed below.

For all your administrative procedures, you can go to the City hall of Dodge Center at the address and schedules indicated on this page or contact the Town hall government by phone or by email depending on your preference or on the service's availability.

Update data

Where is Dodge Center, Minnesota ?

Dodge Center is located in Dodge County, in southeastern Minnesota, United States. It is situated approximately 20 miles west of Rochester and about 70 miles southeast of Minneapolis. The municipality lies along U.S. Highway 14, providing connections to other regional towns and cities, including Owatonna to the west.
